data.actual_result: You will notice that the keypad is unresponsive to the numbers entered. At the moment, to fix this, hit "Back".
data.expected_result: You should be able to enter it manually.
data.short_description: When on the Two-Factor authentication screen for the IOS Testflight build, keypad is unresponsive after box is clicked.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be sure to have 2-Step-Authorization enabled. - Sign out of your mobile Discord account. (Note this is for IOS Tesfight users) - Login to your account as usual. - Upon entering the 2-Step-Authentication page, click on the first box. - Then try inputting your code given.
